mapper.sql: id, status, attributes, type, version, unique_key, start_time, timeout, msg, ip, retry_count, orig_retry_count, execute_interval_seconds, alarm_threshold, env, parent_id, children_count
mapper.insert: insert into task_queue ( gmt_create, gmt_modified, attributes, type, version, unique_key, start_time, timeout, retry_count, orig_retry_count, execute_interval_seconds, alarm_threshold, env, parent_id, children_count, status, execute_timeout ) values ( now(), now(), #{attributes}, #{type}, 0, #{uniqueKey}, #{startTime}, #{timeout}, #{origRetryCount}, #{origRetryCount}, #{executeIntervalSeconds}, #{alarmThreshold}, #{env}, #{parentId}, #{childrenCount}, #{status}, #{executeTimeout} )
mapper.update: update task_queue set gmt_modified = now() ,status = 1 ,version = version + 1 ,ip = #{ip} where id = #{id} and status = 0
update task_queue set gmt_modified = now() ,status = 0 ,version= version + 1 ,ip = null where id = #{id} and status = 1
update task_queue set gmt_modified = now() ,status = 0 ,version= version + 1 ,retry_count = retry_count - 1 ,start_time = #{startTime} ,msg = #{msg} where id = #{id} and status = 1
update task_queue set gmt_modified = now() ,status = 2 ,version= version + 1 ,retry_count = retry_count - 1 ,msg = #{msg} where id = #{id} and status = 1
update task_queue set gmt_modified = now() ,status = 3 ,version = version + 1 ,msg = 'SUCCESS' where id = #{id} and status = 1
update task_queue set gmt_modified = now() ,version = version + 1 ,children_count = children_count - 1 where id = #parentId#
mapper.select: select id,type,attributes,retry_count,execute_interval_seconds,alarm_threshold,env,timeout from task_queue where status = 0 AND start_time <= now() AND children_count = 0 AND env = #{env} order by id asc limit #{limit}
mapper.update: update task_queue set gmt_modified = now() ,version = version + 1 ,status = 0 where status = 1 and execute_timeout < #{currentTime}
mapper.delete: delete from task_queue where status = 3 and last_modified < #{lastModified}
